1470277981239394304.full_text: #NanjingMassacre We Chinese will never forget this national tragedy. Hatred of the Japanese runs in our blood.

1470264777503133701.full_text: China's national flag flew at half-mast at the memorial ceremony to mourn the 300,000 victims killed by Japanese troops in #NanjingMassacre. title.string_value: Graphics: China's contribution and loss in War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression

description.string_value: China's war against the Japanese invaders started the earliest, lasted the longest, and featured the toughest conditions as well as the most sacrifices during the world's anti-fascist war.

1470269765302194178.full_text: The atrocities and blunt disregard for human lives in the #NanjingMassacre can never be described in words.
